programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: The Sahara, the largest desert in the world: an extreme environment covering a vast swathe of northern Africa. With hardly any water or food available, on the surface, it appears to be a desolate empty land. But hidden beyond the parched exterior, specialist species have adapted to this harsh landscape..

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: The Misfit is a charismatic cub who's had a rough ride. A timid oddball once bullied by his big brothers and rejected by his mother, this plucky young lion is now a teenager.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: Thandi and Lula are two-month-old wild dog pups ? the only females in a litter of six. Lula loves to rough and tumble with her brothers, while Thandi is more of a loner, often exploring away from the others.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Ethiopia is a wilderness of extremes - from lush lakes to towering peaks - where life has had to adapt in order to survive. This ancient land has cradled life since the dawn of time, and beyond the scorched deserts lie fortified mountains that conceal natural treasure troves of wildlife found nowhere else on Earth.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol‚Äôs need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be ‚Äì and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pol‚Äôs are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pol‚Äôs are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time ‚Äì and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Now that the pups have arrived, Dogtown is officially under new management. In the Flatlands, June tries to help her risk-averse pup find his confidence, while Ruby faces off against an invading Prairie Dog family.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: With nourishing food scarce in the Highlands, Charlotte must learn to fight back against bullies to survive the harsh dry season.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Not all lions in the Savage Kingdom are born equal while the Marsh Pride dominates the beating heart of the realm, the three lionesses of the Northern Pride struggle to hold their ground in the forests and hills. Once a great pride, their sons have been banished, and if they can't rebuild their pride they face hunger, exile or worse..

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx. But for the female lynxes of the valley, it is always a challenge to raise their cubs. The series follows the lynxes in their struggle for survival, from the thrill of the hunt to the tender moments of parenting, and also witnesses their coexistence with other animals like majestic golden eagles or powerful deer.

programme.title: Lake Tanganyika: Africa's Blue Heart
programme.desc: Lake Tanganyika, one of the largest lakes on earth combines two very different yet equally magical worlds: an untouched wilderness along the shores, home to chimpanzees, elephants and antelopes and a spectacularly diverse underwater universe. The lake shares many of the ocean‚Äôs characteristics. Glorious sunsets, occasional storms with terrifying waves and waters filled with sardines, colorful fish, crabs and even sponges.

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: We've seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: A Leopard's Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambia‚Äôs Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. She‚Äôs just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, it‚Äôs a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies.

programme.title: Lake Tanganyika: Africa's Blue Heart

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Rule of the kingdom is reserved only for the strong. Five heroes, each with a unique power, head up rival families struggling for power, clawing their way to the top. The winners are rewarded with the richest hunting grounds in the kingdom, but the fate of the losers is brutal - exile or death. Fighting to survive, killing to succeed - nothing will stop them trying to reign supreme over the Savage Kingdom..

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: She haunts the trees and hills in the heart of the realm. She is solitary, silent and virtually invisible. Saba the leopard is a killer without rival. Saba is the most spectacular and resourceful hunter the Savage Kingdom has seen. Her stronghold, Leopard Rock, sits at the heart of this brutal realm it is a place where she can vanish into the shadows and avoid running into her rivals lions, hyenas and wild dogs.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: A small family of wild dogs is on the run desperately looking for a safe place to raise six, tiny puppies, but the Savage Kingdom will test them to the limit. The sanctuary they seek is filled with rivals who stand in their way and predators who want to eat their puppies. Only the resolve of their dedicated leaders, Teemana and Malao, can save them..

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Merlin the macaw lands at the clinic for a beak trim and ruffles a few feathers. Dr. Pol responds to an emergency call for an ailing alpaca, and Dr. Lisa pulls porcupine quills from a feisty cow. Dr. Brenda performs an emergency C-section on a Pit bull, as Dr. Nicole is called out to aid a stalled farrowing. Charles hopes that he has a solution for seat-stealing Tater.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: It‚Äôs Father‚Äôs Day, and the team is busy as a puppy tornado touches down at the clinic. Dr. Pol treats a peahen with an injured leg as Dr. Lisa performs surgery to repair wounds from a dog fight. Dr. Nicole rescues a kitten on her way into work, and Dr. Brenda discovers multiple abscesses on cat. Away from the clinic, Charles comes up with a plan to help his dad relax and enjoy the holiday.

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind
programme.desc: Every year, more and more people head to the ocean to swim, sail, fish or scuba, and every year, more and more of us experience astonishing wild encounters that go viral. Want to know why an octopus would slap a kayaker or why a sea snake might want to be best friends? Take a deep dive into some of the craziest clips to discover what‚Äôs really going on.

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Wild Kind
programme.desc: Safaris are a great way to meet some of the planet‚Äôs most iconic animals, but sometimes, the wildlife gets a little too close for comfort.
